snippet: SILBERMANN--Kurt. Cantor of Temple Emanu-El of Englewood, NJ for over 30 years, he died peacefully at age 92 after a distinguished life and career. He leaves his wife of 68 years, Inge (May) Silbermann, his daughter Judy Freilich and son-in-law Ary Freilich, and granddaughters Elizabeth Freilich and Sarah Benedek and her husband David Benedek. Funeral services will be held at Temple Emanu-El of Closter, NJ on Monday morning. For information call Eden Memorial at 201-947-3336. May his memory be for a blessing. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SILBERMANN--Kurt. Cantor of Temple Emanu-El of Englewood, NJ for over 30 years, he died peacefully at age 92 after a distinguished life and career. He leaves his wife of 68 years, Inge (May) Silbermann, his daughter Judy Freilich and son-in-law Ary Freilich, and granddaughters Elizabeth Freilich and Sarah Benedek and her husband David Benedek. Funeral services will be held at Temple Emanu-El of Closter, NJ on Monday morning. For information call Eden Memorial at 201-947-3336. May his memory be for a blessing. 1/3
